title: 'What more do you need?'
body: I can't use a mouse without a mousepad and this mouse is way better than the other ones I've used in the past. It's smooth, works well with MacOS, the touch feels amazing and it's technically should be called butter. No lag issues. Scroller is on point. Extremely satisfied!

title: 'Best'
body: The Lenovo 300 Wireless Compact Mouse is a stellar product. It combines portability, performance, and affordability into one neat package. If you're in need of a reliable, travel-friendly mouse that doesn't compromise on functionality, look no further. This mouse has earned its five-star rating and has become an essential part of my mobile workstation.

title: 'Not that great product.'
body: Initially mouse worked really well for about 2 months. Now it started giving issues like - mouse pointer is not moving in sync with the hand motion. It gets stuck even though web page or controls are active. I had to rapidly move it to get the mouse pointer moving again. Sometimes it happens during the presentation or screen sharing with my bosses. It's really embarrassing situation. I had to explain that mouse is not working properly. Overall not very happy with product.
